answerText: "The Short Happy Life of Francis Macomber"[10] This author of "The Short Happy Life of Francis Macomber" also wrote a number of short stories featuring Nick Adams, as well as "The Snows of Kilimanjaro."
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 7 | 19 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this story, Wilson refers to the title character's wife as "the Memsahib." For 10 points each: [10] Name this short story in which that frustrated wife, Margot, notices a change in the title character after a successful hunt and shoots him as he faces a buffalo.
